descriptionHtml:
[center][/center]                    [size=5]  [color=#00ff00]                        [/color][color=#00ff00][center][/center][/color][center][color=#00ff00]SPRINGTIME ENB
 [/color] >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>[color=#ff0000] DIABLOXX22 [/color]<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<[/center][center][/center][/size]  


Original autor of this enb is [b][color=#ff0000]opethfeldt[/color][/b]. [u]ALL credits to him[/u]. I have only edited some thing for more colour and green
vegetation.

HAVE FUN. and [u]thanks[/u] again to opethfeldt!

[b][color=#ff0000]Opethfeldt original enb[/color][/b]: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18941/?]Opethfeldt[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=3]My official facebook page[/size][/color]: [url=https://www.facebook.com/pages/ENB-GAMES-VIDEO/104532719710981?ref=hl]Facebook [/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=3]My official Youtube channel[/size][/color]: [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCebt78I1HhB7abXwAK2ljGg]Youtube Channel[/url]

CROSSFIREX users, check this link: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/846958724781912070/]http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/846958724781912070/[/url], Basically you have to use GW2*.exe profile to make this ENB work correctly.
(Thanks to CaptainStuhben for he info).

[center]
[youtube]WnGqPVeE9TY[/youtube][/center]

[center][color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION: 
[/color]=============[/center]

[center][youtube]vTTQXoLd4bA[/youtube][/center]
[color=#ff0000][size=6][b]-DOWNLOAD MANUALLY FIRST.[/b][/size][/color]

0. DELETE any leftover, like the EFFECT.TXT file located in skyrim folder if you are coming from a different ENB config.. Disable any other Grapical mod: CoT, RLFX, etc. this config is meant to be used with Vanilla game and my ESP included, nothing more is supported.

1. Copy all the files to your Skyrim directory (where TESV.exe is located), click yes if asked to overwrite.

2. Get the d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe from [b]ENB v0.236[/b] [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]HERE[/url] (only the d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe from "WrapperVersion" folder are needed)

3. Download [b]ENB Helper[/b], which is indispensable for this config and it's weather feature: [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENB helper[/url]. Put enbhelper.dll inside the "Enbseries" folder

4. [b]Install [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499]Mindflux's Skyrim Particle Patch[/url]

5. Run the game launcher (SkyrimLauncher.exe) DISABLE THE OLD "ENB_REFERENCE.esp" , enable the Opeth_Weather.esp and Opeth_torch if you prefer a brighter torch fire, just put both at the end of the list.

6. Edit the next lines inside "SkyrimPrefs.ini" located in "C:Users********DocumentsMy GamesSkyrim" to look like this:

[b]iMultiSample=0[/b] < ----AA needs to be disabled
[b]iBlurDeferredShadowMask=1[/b]
[b]fGamma=1.0000[/b]
[b]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/b]
[b]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/b]
[b]bDrawLandShadows=1[/b]
[b]bShadowsOnGrass=1[/b]

7 Disable AA in your graphics card Control Panel too. 

8. play?

9. To enable the ingame GUI, press Shift+PageDown, to modify the current weather activate "show weather window"


[color=#ff0000][size=5]
[u]Download D3d9.dll here:[/u]        [/size][/color][size=5] [u] http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm[/u]
[/size]



[color=#ff0000][size=4]-All mods for best Experience like screenshots:[/size][/color]

-Grass mod: Grass field                                 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50875/?]Click Here[/url]
-Skyrim Flora overhaul summer edition          [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Click here[/url]
-Season On skyrim Sprigtime Overhaul           [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27636/?]Click Here[/url]
-Skyrim Bigger Trees 1.6                              [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17168/?]Click Here[/url]
-EDWS with sunny .esp                                 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8739/?]Click Here[/url]
-Watercolor for enb                                     [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?]Click Here[/url]
-Realistic Water Two                                   [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Click Here[/url]
-Dat grass  avaible in optional download ;)
author: Diabloxx22
